title.narrative: Projet d’Appui à la mise en œuvre du Programme Cadre Intégré Renforcé (PAPCIR) en République du BENIN

description.narrative: Phase 1: Improve and strengthen the institutional framework for the implementation of the EIF in order to sustain the achievements of the development of export support programme ensure a better integration of trade in the national growth strategy (SCRP), increase the supply capacities of Benin, strengthen Government and private sector dialogue and improve the coordination between the Government and donors. Phase 2: The project objective, building on the first phase, is to pursue the objectives of the first phase, specifically targeting the mainstreaming of trade in national development plans and the mobilization of resources to support activities identified as priorities in the update of the Diagnostic Trade Integration Study (DTIS).
